title.zh: 线上：ASH美国血液学会年会摘要接收
title.en: Online: ASH American Society of Hematology Annual Meeting Abstract Accepted

description.zh: 以华中科技大学数学与统计学院的左钰洁、安心宇，南昌大学第三附属医院（南昌市第一医院）临床检验科的古艳，华中科技大学同济医学院公共卫生学院的龙品品、何洋帆、姚婷耀，华中科技大学生命科学学院的万嘉瑞为作者，安徽医科大学第二附属医院的周莉为通讯作者的摘要《一种用于识别中部地区女性血友病携带者及女性血友病患者的低成本临床预测模型》已被第67届美国血液学会年会接收为海报展示。
description.en: The abstract 'A low-cost Clinical Prediction model for identifying female hemophilia carriers and women and girls with hemophilia (WGH) in central China' authored by Yujie (Ruby) Zuo and An Xinyu from School of Mathematics and Statistics at HUST, Gu Yan from Clinical Laboratory of the Third Affiliated Hospital of Nanchang University (Nanchang First Hospital), Long Pinpin, He Yangfan, and Yao Tingyao from School of Public Health at Tongji Medical College of HUST, Wan Jiarui from School of Life Sciences at HUST, with Zhou Li from Second Affiliated Hospital of Anhui Medical University as corresponding author, has been accepted for poster presentation at the 67th ASH Annual Meeting and Exposition.
